html:
12.13.19  8:55 am   Do you get tired of answering so many questions?

     no, each one makes me more awake

12.13.19  8:26 am   Im beginning to question the questions asked, have I become to doubtful.

     are you sure

12.13.19  8:16 am   Whats your favorite pickle jar pickle

     fuck pickles

12.13.19  6:19 am   do you like it when people are unsolicitedly very friendly to you in here

     yes

      or does it just delay/inhibit your surely rampaging tendency to get stronger from challenging questions

     it is good, the only challenge is coming up with something constructive to say in response

12.13.19  6:11 am   Are you planning on making new music any sooner?

     yes

12.13.19  5:14 am   i'm bad at music and when i try to make things i get frustrated and stop trying. Advice?

     try doing this as an experiment: try making things that are much much smaller and shorter. that way they will be done before you can stop trying

12.13.19  5:06 am   Was the way you finessed reality into your markedly surreal style of music(and videos) something you consciously cultivated or was it what came naturally for you?

     i consciously cultivated it, naturally. hold on, still cultivating

12.13.19  3:56 am   i feel like u could do a really good cover of sledgehammer by peter gabriel. i know this isnt a question youre just really talented at working groovy beats

     i would prefer to take something that does not already have an awesome groove and bring it one

12.13.19  3:46 am   how to think good

     speak a little

12.13.19  3:43 am   i only cry when im asserting myself. this is a shitty defense mechanism and i want it to go away.

     i think that sounds pretty cool actually

12.13.19  3:05 am   What do you think of following words:
Fuck
Shit
Piss

     they're pretty good

      Additionally, i would also like to ask for your favourite 1 dimensional shape.

     dotted line

12.13.19  2:41 am   Why are all of your answers so funny and wonderful?

     sounds like you've been reading between the lines

12.13.19  2:03 am   What is purple :/?

     i've always wondered

12.13.19  1:28 am   what's so amazing that keeps us stargazing and what do we think we might see?

     almost anything in the entire universe

12.13.19  1:28 am   im inspired, did you ever get detention or something in school

     not sure, there might have been one time

      and if so what'd you do

     listen to john scofield records or something

12.13.19  1:24 am   bill. bill. you've answered all the questions. what do i do now

     make a feature film, for sure

12.13.19  1:18 am   is it just me or are you answering more velcro related questions than usual lately

     velcro is timeless

12.13.19  1:17 am   Do you have a favorite sport

     yes! it's when you accidentally kick a pebble into someone else's car. like you were just walking normally and then suddenly a pebble catches your shoe and flies into someone's very new expensive car

12.13.19  1:09 am   Is water wet? This question has run unanswered by my entire school for a couple of months.

     i've found it's best not to get involved with that one

12.13.19  1:07 am   What do I do with the music I record but that sounds bad. I am banking on the hope that my recordings in the future will eventually sound good

     they might. or you might know what context to put them in

12.13.19  1:07 am   Do you have a favorite meme format?

     feature film

12.13.19  1:04 am   if you ever do promo stuff while on tour (radio, video, tv interviews) you'll be well prepared cuz they'll probably ask 90% the same questions all the time like they do on here lol

     i've noticed that

12.13.19  1:03 am   Would you prefer pineapple on pizza or pizza on pineapple?

     how about a pineapple filled with pizza

12.13.19  12:55 am   Where's the velcro?

     down in the cellar

12.13.19  12:12 am   Do you eat anything else other than blades of grass.

     i have never eaten a blade of grass

12.13.19  12:03 am   how many of your awake hours are spent in silence?

     0 to 1

12.12.19  11:59 pm   what do you think you get asked about the most, food, music, important life stuff or questions?

     food

12.12.19  11:57 pm   what isn't the square root of three?

     most things

12.12.19  11:52 pm   what would a crossover between bill wurtz and angry birds be like?

     curious birds

12.12.19  11:45 pm   Will you ever make a Bill Wurtz operating system? Would be very cool!

     maybe if i ever get more connected with Apple, maybe i can just convince the Mac OS team to tweak the little things i don't like about it

12.12.19  11:39 pm   you are wonderful!! please have a good day!!!! your content, and reading these answers every day, brings me much happiness.

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.12.19  11:23 pm   if you had to say, what would be your ratio of real answers to joke answers?

     i must bake the jokes into reality, and bake reality into the jokes. that's just the only thing that does it for me

12.12.19  11:23 pm   I recently got a new computer & I don't know what do do with it, any suggestions? 

     write your name in it somewhere

12.12.19  11:19 pm   Are there true contradictions?

     NO! actually,

12.12.19  11:06 pm   My idea of Success is being able to make ideas and stuff while being rich enough to buy a [dwelling and food and paper to write on], but I don't know how to do any of that and careers seem boring.

     maybe you just haven't found the right kind

      What's a career?

     sounds like some sort of train car

      Do you like your career?

     i am sometimes terrified of how good it might be

12.12.19  10:58 pm   This is not a question but I just wanted to say that I love your music :) 

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.12.19  10:55 pm   Happy Holidays Bill! What are you planning to do for Christmas?

     continue trying to amount to something

12.12.19  10:39 pm   Are you sitting as you read this?

     no

      If so, can you describe the object you're sitting on in some detail?

12.12.19  10:27 pm   opinions on capitalization

     good, it's almost like 2 fonts in one

12.12.19  10:26 pm   Am I mentally retarded?

     probably not

      I make my mother terribly upset, because I fail at college and I have no motivation to study.

     you are studying something right now

      How do I stop making her upset?

     maybe some distance would help. move away for a little while

      How do I stop my life to crumble down in front of me?

     what is something you enjoy

      And what's the best way to stop being a disappointment to everyone around me? 

     i'm wondering why everyone has such specific expectations for you. shouldn't they mind their own business? again, a little bit of space may help. find out what you are truly interested in and what you enjoy. pursue that line of thinking a little more

12.12.19  10:13 pm   could you make your own simulation of the world?

     yes

12.12.19  10:09 pm   do you wholesome? 

     yes, especially at parties

12.12.19  9:58 pm   this is the easter bunny 

     oh hi

12.12.19  9:45 pm   What are your opinions on fluorescent asphalt?

     that sounds wonderful

12.12.19  9:44 pm   I don't have a question

     that's ok

12.12.19  9:44 pm   How long does a jingle take to make?

     anywhere from 4 seconds to 2 days

12.12.19  9:35 pm   do you believe in science?

     yes

12.12.19  9:24 pm   What is the maximum speed of a boomerang?

     about 100km/hr

12.12.19  9:22 pm   What goes in toasters?

     your worries and sorrows

12.12.19  9:05 pm   Do you write out notes or chords for your songs

     yes

      or is it a big collection of little improv bits? And if so would you ever considering releasing that so people could make covers or band arrangements?

     if you are capable of making an arrangement of a song, i can guarantee you do not need to see it written to know what the chords and melodies are
